review: The voice remote is the best! This was so incredibly easy to use and set up and gives us access to all of our media outlets including Netflix, Prime, Hulu Plus, and YouTube (through ProTube) and many other built-in apps. My husband and I just made the leap from cable to streaming services, and this was the best device for the transition (we didn't want one that required us to use our phones). I'm excited to purchase the Fire Stick for the other TVs in our home.

author: Kiwasha S Kelly

review: I only leave reviews (not very in-depth) for items that I feel deserve it (Good or Bad).I bought this after listening to a iDB podcast. I'm very glad I did.The device is more capable than I thought, especially compared to the Apple TV 3 (which I've had for years).A couple neat things:-support of many different USB devices and inputs. I use the XBOX 360 wireless dongle to hook up 4 XBOX 360 controllers for their games and controlling the interface in general.-Bluetooth remote. That means you don't have to point the controller at the box which means you can hide it behind the TV out of the way.I use it more for the XBMC/Kodi application you can put on it; runs like a dream.Tech savvy users:The real bang for your buck, to take advantage of the powerful hardware, is after you tweak it slightly (just google aftvnews and read BEFORE hooking it up online)
author: Wolfe
